list_translation_mean.translate_mean: vị trí mẫu âm của vần

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a place where someone or something is located or has been put.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the distress call had given the ship's position
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Cuộc gọi đau khổ đã đưa ra vị trí của con tàu

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a particular way in which someone or something is placed or arranged.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: he moved himself into a reclining position
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Anh tự di chuyển mình vào một vị trí ngả

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a situation or set of circumstances, especially one that affects one's power to act.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the company's financial position is grim
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Tình hình tài chính của công ty là nghiệt ngã

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a person's point of view or attitude toward something.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: I’ll never accept his position on censorship
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Tôi sẽ không bao giờ chấp nhận vị trí của mình về kiểm duyệt

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: an investor's net holdings in one or more markets at a particular time; the status of an individual or institutional trader's open contracts.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Thương nhân đã bao gồm các vị trí ngắn

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a proposition laid down or asserted; a tenet or assertion.
put or arrange (someone or something) in a particular place or way.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: he pulled out a chair and positioned it between them
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Anh ta rút ra một cái ghế và định vị nó giữa chúng
